name: PQ Musescore Night Theme
description:
Makes Musescore dark.
Also uses invert filter to make sheet music black and uses custom scrollbars.

user.name: pixelqiwi
user.about:
I am a self proclaimed web-designer with a passion to make every site more comfortable for me to use. I also have my own website that I have made from scratch, with my own hands. No Bootstrap, no templates, only me, my text editor and my trusty CSS textbook. 

My styles are all Public Domain because it's not like I own the CSS of the website anyway. Feel free to throw some pennies my way though, that's always appreciated!

additional_info:
19 may 2020 update: 
redid everything from scratch again, darkened everything i could get my hands on (i'm not an active musescore user so sorry if i missed a spot or two)
css:
/* not sure, but this one should work better*/

@-moz-document domain("musescore.com") {
/* redoing everything from nothing */
body::-webkit-scrollbar,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar
{
    width: 12px !important;
}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar-track
{
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
{
    background-color: #666 !important;
}

body
{
    background: #111
}

.rWbJE,

{

{

._2mCkl td,

._31gzi.ucYwV,

{

    border: none;
    padding: 12px
}

._3HKzi a,
._1VNhV,

{

}

._2jwGg,
._3928m._2jTcG ._2_zNz,
.-uVbE
{
    background-color: #09f
}

.-uVbE:hover
{
    background-color: #4af
}


._2Ifc-._8pMIq path
{
    fill: #eee
}

._15kzJ._2uj9v._1Us9e:hover
{
    color: #09f
}

.gXB83,
.SA76l img
{
    filter: invert(0.9) hue-rotate(180deg)
}

.score-manager .views-exposed-form input[type="submit"]
{
    background: #111 url(https://musescore.com/static/public/img/musescore/search.svg) no-repeat 50%;
    background-size: 18px auto;
}

._1qu2I._1gkKD
{
    background: transparent
}
}
